scripts.zip: zip dist/connect.zip connect.js && zip dist/disconnect.zip disconnect.js && zip dist/trigger.zip trigger.js
scripts.upload: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name connect --zip-file fileb://dist/connect.zip --region ca-central-1 && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name disconnect --zip-file fileb://dist/disconnect.zip --region ca-central-1 && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name dynamoTrigger --zip-file fileb://dist/trigger.zip --region ca-central-1
